title: Monthly Environmental KPI Reporting
description: An HSE manager compiles the monthly environmental performance report for a refinery, including metrics on emissions, spills, and waste disposal.

tasks.description: Gather data for the month from various systems: total SO2/NOx emissions from CEMS, number of spills from the incident log, and total waste manifests.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required environmental data for the month is collected.

tasks.description: Populate the standard monthly environmental KPI dashboard with the collected data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The KPI dashboard is updated with the latest month's figures.

tasks.description: Compare the month's performance against targets and historical trends, adding commentary on any significant deviations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is finalized with analysis and commentary and distributed to plant management.
